actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-9.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 1239) making urgent supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1985, for emergency famine relief and recovery in Africa, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 1239 (emergency famine relief for Africa).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 1239) making urgent supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1985, for emergency famine relief and recovery in Africa, and for other purposes.
